text: "Freshwater herring" is a term applied to a wide variety of freshwater fish which resemble herring: *Clupeoides papuensis, toothed river herring *Coregonus albula, vendace *Potamalosa richmondia, Australian freshwater herring *Salvelinus grayi, the Lough Melvin charr *Sardinella tawilis, the bombon sardine
title: Freshwater herring
